items.summary: Update the Level 4 screen copy and headings to match the provided script exactly, including: the level label, the tagline "During difficult matches, teammates stay.", the two appreciation moments, and the result text "WE SURVIVED TOGETHER".

Update the Mini Game 3 (FIFA Penalty Shootout) screen to match the provided script exactly: show the "FINAL CHANCE TO SCORE" prompt, ask "What always wins her heart?", display the four provided choices in the same wording, and make "Efforts and showing up" the only correct answer that triggers success state text "GOAL!" and "GOAL SCORED IN JOSHI'S HEART".

Adjust the Final Proposal sequence to include the scripted pacing and messaging: show "MISSION COMPLETE" and "Solo mode finished.", then present the additional pause beat text ("Pauseâ€¦" and "New mode?") before revealing the "DUO MODE REQUEST" message "This game (of life) has been a lot more fun with you in it.".

Ensure the Ending/Achievement screen matches the provided script after the user accepts (YES): display "Achievement Unlocked" with title "Valentine Partner 2026", show the three rewards with the exact wording provided, and render the final line "Best matches are played with great teamwork.".
Add a generated achievement badge image asset and render it on the Ending/Achievement screen as a static frontend asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.
